effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.
effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.

short_effect.sword_shield: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.
